name: Scrunchies
description: Experience the ultimate in hair care accessories. These scrunchies are intentionally designed with a generous, cloud-like fullness that minimizes snagging, creasing, and breakage. Made with delicate, high-quality material, they provide a secure hold without the harsh tension of traditional ties. It's the kindest way to keep your hair up, ensuring your locks remain healthy, smooth, and beautifully held.
